name: IN THE BUILDING: CATS 3
description:
IN THE BUILDING: CATS 3 is a game in which you have to find all the cute cats. Cats will hide in all houses. Search every corner of the room, move the pillows, open the nightstands, check the toilet... Cats can hide in the most unpredictable places.
In the third part of the game, you have to search not only the large hall and bathroom, but also the bedroom.
Key features:
5 houses;
250 cats;
Hints;
During the development of this game, we were motivated by the game "A Building Full of Cats".
